title.heading: What is nutri 3.3 blending?
title.paragraph1:
nutri3.3 blending provides ready-to-market products.
Seize the opportunity to enjoy all services from A to Z from product concept, package, and branding.
title.nutri_list: * nutri3.3 blending can only be purchased within the options provided.
title.nutri_list1: *After receiving product quotation, consultation and contract are concluded, payment and production will proceed.
title.desc1: Take a look at our branded products
title.desc2: Choose the product you want to launch
title.desc3: Click the Get an estimate button at the bottom of the detail page on selected product
title.desc4: We will contact you after checking

nutriDetails.title: A service just for you
nutriDetails.title2: Easily seize your own product launch opportunity!

title.title: Sample making guide
title.subtitle: nutri 3.3 sample service
title.titledesc: Make the health functional core food sample you want in nutri 3.3!
title.titledesc1: It can be produced at a sampling cost of 300,000 won (VAT included) per one time.
title.text: *Sample service is a paid service, and it usually takes 3 weeks for delivery after payment is completed.

sampleprocress.title: Sample service process
sampleprocress.desc1: Request for sample production on your desired sample from my choice in nutri 3.3.
sampleprocress.desc_sub: (Sample production costs 300,000 won / Additional modifications are charged separately)
sampleprocress.desc2: We check your requirements based on the sample service requested.
sampleprocress.desc3: We develop samples based on the requested information.
sampleprocress.desc4: We produce samples after product development
sampleprocress.desc5: The finished sample will be shipped to your address.

sampleFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sampleFaq.ques1: How long does sample production take?
sampleFaq.ans1: Usually takes about 3 weeks after payment is completed, but it may varies by product.
sampleFaq.ques2: What is the volume and quantity of samples provided?
sampleFaq.ans2: Sample quantity offered is as follows: * Tablets: 30T / Capsules: 30C / Packets: 10 Packs

title.title: If you want to have your own health functional food brand easily and conveniently

recommended.title: Recommend to these people!
recommended.rule2_2: because there are too many prohibitions like pharmaceuticals, complicated approval process from public organization!
recommended.rule3: I’m concerned about minimum quantity and high cost.

service.title: Easy & handy health functional food manufacturing navigation
service.subtitle: nutri 3.3 service
service.rule1_content: nutri3.3 blending provides ready-to-market products. Seize the opportunity to easily enjoy all services from A to Z from product concept, package, and branding.
service.rule2_content: Recommended blending is a semi-finished product that already has effective raw materials and formulations, and is a recommended recipe for those who have difficulty choosing raw materials.
service.rule3_content: my choice is a service to make one and only one-of-a-kind products with the raw materials I personally selected.
service.rule4_content: Free estimate service helps you to create your own health functional food that is combined as you like.
service.rule5_content: The sample making service provides an opportunity to make a health functional food sample of your choice at a sampling cost of 300,000 won.
